column4: Can someone help me figure out why a ttf font isn't showing up in xfontsel?
how did you install the font?
i coped it into /usr/share/fonts/truetype/custom, and then ran fc-cache -fv
and you did run fc-cache -fv as sudo ?
does ls -l /usr/share/fonts/truetype/custom  list them all and show them as being root root ?
they do have a .ttf extension and not a .TTF extension right
should i rename them and restart X?
for i in fonts/*.ttf fonts/*.TTF; do cp "$i" .fonts; done  and do the sudo fc-cache -fv  again and restart X
change the path or cd into the dir
sorry buddy.. out of ideas unless you can do this http://manpages.ubuntu.com/manpages/karmic/man8/update-fonts-dir.8.html
